experience.title: Solutions Delivery Analyst
experience.location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
experience.description: Responsible for end-to-end project delivery of CTOS Application & Decisioning System and CTOS eKYC System, ensuring timely implementation tailored to client requirements.Facilitated project initiation by preparing and conducting walkthroughs of Functional Specification documents, gathering and refining client requirements to align solutions with business needs.Acted as the primary point of contact for functional queries during the integration phase, collaborating with the technical team to address in-depth technical concerns and resolving issues promptly through scheduled Teams calls or on-site support.Conducted basic Quality Assurance (QA) to validate system functionality and ensure a smooth user experience prior to client testing.Designed and delivered comprehensive training sessions, equipping core users with the skills and materials necessary to conduct internal training and support long-term solution adoption.Provided hands-on User Acceptance Testing (UAT) support, guiding both core and end-users through validation of the system‚Äôs readiness for production.Managed the transition to the production environment post-UAT sign-off, ensuring consistency with the UAT setup and facilitating a smooth go-live handover to the client.
experience.description_html:
Responsible for end-to-end project delivery of CTOS Application & Decisioning System and CTOS eKYC System, ensuring timely implementation tailored to client requirements.

Facilitated project initiation by preparing and conducting walkthroughs of Functional Specification documents, gathering and refining client requirements to align solutions with business needs.

Acted as the primary point of contact for functional queries during the integration phase, collaborating with the technical team to address in-depth technical concerns and resolving issues promptly through scheduled Teams calls or on-site support.

Conducted basic Quality Assurance (QA) to validate system functionality and ensure a smooth user experience prior to client testing.

Designed and delivered comprehensive training sessions, equipping core users with the skills and materials necessary to conduct internal training and support long-term solution adoption.

Provided hands-on User Acceptance Testing (UAT) support, guiding both core and end-users through validation of the system’s readiness for production.

Managed the transition to the production environment post-UAT sign-off, ensuring consistency with the UAT setup and facilitating a smooth go-live handover to the client.

experience.title: Product Consultant
experience.description: Provided after-sales support by handling client inquiries via calls and emails, resolving product-related issues, and ensuring continuous client satisfaction.Created Functional Specification and User Test Step documents, translating client requirements into clear deliverables and step-by-step user guides to facilitate system understanding and usage throughout the project lifecycle.Performed Quality Testing prior to User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to ensure system functionality aligned with client requirements and real-world business workflows.Delivered remote user guidance using tools like TeamViewer and LogMeIn, offering real-time support and troubleshooting directly on clients' machines to address system issues effectively.Managed and monitored JIRA issue tracking system, actively resolving and documenting client cases, including those not officially submitted, to maintain accountability and transparency.Supported User Acceptance Testing sessions, assisting core and end-users in validating system performance and usability, leading to final acceptance and successful deployment.
experience.description_html:
Provided after-sales support by handling client inquiries via calls and emails, resolving product-related issues, and ensuring continuous client satisfaction.

Created Functional Specification and User Test Step documents, translating client requirements into clear deliverables and step-by-step user guides to facilitate system understanding and usage throughout the project lifecycle.

Performed Quality Testing prior to User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to ensure system functionality aligned with client requirements and real-world business workflows.

Delivered remote user guidance using tools like TeamViewer and LogMeIn, offering real-time support and troubleshooting directly on clients' machines to address system issues effectively.

Managed and monitored JIRA issue tracking system, actively resolving and documenting client cases, including those not officially submitted, to maintain accountability and transparency.

Supported User Acceptance Testing sessions, assisting core and end-users in validating system performance and usability, leading to final acceptance and successful deployment.

experience.title: Business Solution Consultant
experience.description: Gathered and analyzed client-specific requirements for various modules in a proprietary in-house system, ensuring tailored development aligned with unique business needs.Conducted comprehensive quality testing prior to User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to verify that all client requirements were accurately implemented and the system workflows mirrored real-world business scenarios.Delivered Train-the-Trainer sessions by preparing training materials and equipping core users with the knowledge to train end-users, ensuring smooth internal adoption post-deployment.Provided hands-on support during UAT sessions, guiding both core and end-users through real-time testing of the completed system to validate functionality and drive user acceptance.
experience.description_html:
Gathered and analyzed client-specific requirements for various modules in a proprietary in-house system, ensuring tailored development aligned with unique business needs.

Conducted comprehensive quality testing prior to User Acceptance Testing (UAT) to verify that all client requirements were accurately implemented and the system workflows mirrored real-world business scenarios.

Delivered Train-the-Trainer sessions by preparing training materials and equipping core users with the knowledge to train end-users, ensuring smooth internal adoption post-deployment.

Provided hands-on support during UAT sessions, guiding both core and end-users through real-time testing of the completed system to validate functionality and drive user acceptance.

experience.title: Functional Consultant
experience.description: Responsible for the successful integration of PeopleSoft Campus Solutions with MIMOSA Scheduling Solutions, enabling seamless data transfer between platforms to streamline and automate academic timetable scheduling.Authored key project documentation including Business Requirements, Functional Specifications, Fit-Gap Analyses, and User Test Steps, ensuring clarity from project initiation through to completion. These documents supported requirement gathering, feasibility analysis, customization planning, and end-user guidance.Performed Quality Assurance (QA) for multiple Campus Solutions modules by validating functionality against User Test Steps created by fellow Functional Consultants, ensuring reliability and user satisfaction.Delivered Train-the-Trainer sessions by developing comprehensive training materials and coaching core client users to become internal trainers, ensuring long-term system adoption and knowledge sustainability.Provided User Acceptance Testing (UAT) support, assisting both core and general users in validating the system's functionality and readiness for go-live.
experience.description_html:
Responsible for the successful integration of PeopleSoft Campus Solutions with MIMOSA Scheduling Solutions, enabling seamless data transfer between platforms to streamline and automate academic timetable scheduling.

Authored key project documentation including Business Requirements, Functional Specifications, Fit-Gap Analyses, and User Test Steps, ensuring clarity from project initiation through to completion. These documents supported requirement gathering, feasibility analysis, customization planning, and end-user guidance.

Performed Quality Assurance (QA) for multiple Campus Solutions modules by validating functionality against User Test Steps created by fellow Functional Consultants, ensuring reliability and user satisfaction.

Delivered Train-the-Trainer sessions by developing comprehensive training materials and coaching core client users to become internal trainers, ensuring long-term system adoption and knowledge sustainability.

Provided User Acceptance Testing (UAT) support, assisting both core and general users in validating the system's functionality and readiness for go-live.

detailed_profile.name: Rajesh E
detailed_profile.position: üöÄ Driving Innovation | Tech Visionary with 15+ Years of Excellence
detailed_profile.about: üöÄ Experienced Senior IT/QA Architect | Test Automation | Performance Testing | Quality Advocate Innovator. Strategist. Technophile. With over 15 years at the forefront of technology, I‚Äôve mastered the art of turning complex IT challenges into groundbreaking solutions. From revolutionizing the gig economy at Scout Park, to co-creating cutting-edge AI-driven physiotherapy platforms with HealPlay, my journey is fueled by a relentless passion for excellence. üåç My global career‚Äîspanning Sweden, India, and beyond‚Äîhas seen me excel as a Solution Architect, CTO, and IT Project Manager, Fullstack developer , QA. Whether it's crafting scalable cloud infrastructures, pioneering cross-platform mobile apps, or leading agile teams, I deliver innovative solutions that shape industries. üí° Highlights of my Expertise: Cloud Wizardry: Firebase, AWS, Google Cloud, and all things serverless. Full-Stack Magic: Flutter, Angular, Node.js, Kotlin, and Swift. Enterprise Leadership: Certified SAFe¬Æ Product Owner/Product Manager driving agile excellence. Diverse Domains: Insurance, Reinsurance, Hospitality, Law, Social Networking, and IoT. üîπ Test Automation: Proficient in industry-standard tools like Selenium, Cypress, and Appium, I build scalable, modular, and reusable frameworks‚Äîwhether keyword-driven, data-driven, or robot-based. üîπ API Testing: Skilled in ReadyAPI and Postman, I ensure seamless API validation and automation. üîπ Performance Testing: Experienced with LoadRunner and JMeter, I assess systems under load, stress, and scalability conditions to guarantee optimal performance. üîπ Technical Expertise: Adept in JavaScript, TypeScript, and VBScript‚Äîwriting efficient test scripts and integrating them with CI/CD pipelines. üîπ Agile & CI/CD: Experienced in Agile, SAFe, and Waterfall methodologies‚Äîestablishing CI/CT/CD environments with Azure DevOps and Jira for faster feedback and superior product quality. Beyond technical capabilities, I‚Äôm a strong communicator and collaborator‚Äîworking closely with developers, business analysts, and architects to drive project success. I thrive on building quality-focused cultures and empowering teams to deliver exceptional products. üåü What sets me apart? My ability to fuse hands-on technical expertise with strategic vision, inspiring teams to create products that aren‚Äôt just functional‚Äîthey‚Äôre transformative. Let‚Äôs connect and collaborate‚Äîtogether, we can redefine the future of quality, one innovation at a time. üí°

experience.title: IT/QA Architect & Technology Officer
experience.description: üöÄ Proud to be the tech Officer and Solution Architect for Scout Park, where we are disrupting and decentralizing the parking surveillance industry!We're transforming how parking violations are monitored by empowering individuals with the latest scanning technology through a gig economy model. No need for expensive surveillance cars or waiting for parking guards‚Äîour users can scan license plates, confirm violations digitally, and earn money instantly.üí° With pilots already in place and a market worth ‚Ç¨34 billion annually in Europe, we‚Äôre scaling fast. Our innovative solutions ensure compliance, streamline operations, and generate value for parking companies.If you own or operate a parking company, let‚Äôs connect! We‚Äôre here to make the future of parking smart, efficient, and rule-compliant. üåç#Innovation #ParkingSolutions #ScoutPark #Decentralization #GigEconomy
experience.description_html:
🚀 Proud to be the tech Officer and Solution Architect for Scout Park, where we are disrupting and decentralizing the parking surveillance industry!
We're transforming how parking violations are monitored by empowering individuals with the latest scanning technology through a gig economy model. No need for expensive surveillance cars or waiting for parking guards—our users can scan license plates, confirm violations digitally, and earn money instantly.
💡 With pilots already in place and a market worth €34 billion annually in Europe, we’re scaling fast. Our innovative solutions ensure compliance, streamline operations, and generate value for parking companies.
If you own or operate a parking company, let’s connect! We’re here to make the future of parking smart, efficient, and rule-compliant. 🌍
#Innovation #ParkingSolutions #ScoutPark #Decentralization #GigEconomy

experience.title: IT/QA Architect
experience.description: As the ITQA MVP Solution Architect for HealPlay, my responsibilities encompass leading the technological vision and execution of our innovative digital physiotherapy platform. I oversee the development and integration of advanced AI and 3D body pose detection technologies to deliver personalized rehabilitation programs. My role also includes ensuring the seamless deployment of our MVP, guiding our tech team, and collaborating with healthcare professionals to refine our solutions, ultimately driving user engagement and enhancing the overall patient experience.
experience.description_html: As the ITQA MVP Solution Architect for HealPlay, my responsibilities encompass leading the technological vision and execution of our innovative digital physiotherapy platform. I oversee the development and integration of advanced AI and 3D body pose detection technologies to deliver personalized rehabilitation programs. My role also includes ensuring the seamless deployment of our MVP, guiding our tech team, and collaborating with healthcare professionals to refine our solutions, ultimately driving user engagement and enhancing the overall patient experience.

positions.subtitle: Lokveeraj : Consulting & Technology Outsourcing Services
positions.description: As Lokveeraj Tech Consulting Services' Managing Director cum CEO since 2019, my role spans diverse domains:1. Strategic Vision: Providing visionary leadership for sustained growth and market relevance.2. Operational Excellence: Optimizing processes and resource utilization in consulting and technology outsourcing.3. Business Development: Leading initiatives, fostering strategic partnerships for business growth.4. Client Engagement: Prioritizing strong client relationships and ensuring exceptional service delivery.5. Financial Management: Responsible for budgeting, forecasting, and strategic resource allocation.6. Team Leadership: Fostering a collaborative work culture, encouraging continuous learning.7. Technology Innovation: Driving innovation in consulting services and technology outsourcing.8. Quality Assurance: Prioritizing rigorous standards to meet or exceed client expectations.9. Risk Management: Actively identifying and mitigating risks in the dynamic business environment.10. Strategic Planning: Formulating and executing comprehensive plans aligned with market trends.11. Stakeholder Communication: Maintaining effective communication for transparency and alignment.12. Market Positioning: Directing efforts towards positioning Lokveeraj as an industry leader.13. Corporate Responsibility: Upholding ethical practices, social impact, and environmental sustainability.In essence, my role drives Lokveeraj Tech Consulting Services' success through strategic leadership, operational excellence, and commitment to client satisfaction and innovation in the tech industry.
positions.title: QA Managing Director
positions.description_html:
As Lokveeraj Tech Consulting Services' Managing Director cum CEO since 2019, my role spans diverse domains:

1. Strategic Vision: Providing visionary leadership for sustained growth and market relevance.

2. Operational Excellence: Optimizing processes and resource utilization in consulting and technology outsourcing.

3. Business Development: Leading initiatives, fostering strategic partnerships for business growth.

4. Client Engagement: Prioritizing strong client relationships and ensuring exceptional service delivery.

5. Financial Management: Responsible for budgeting, forecasting, and strategic resource allocation.

6. Team Leadership: Fostering a collaborative work culture, encouraging continuous learning.

7. Technology Innovation: Driving innovation in consulting services and technology outsourcing.

8. Quality Assurance: Prioritizing rigorous standards to meet or exceed client expectations.

9. Risk Management: Actively identifying and mitigating risks in the dynamic business environment.

10. Strategic Planning: Formulating and executing comprehensive plans aligned with market trends.

11. Stakeholder Communication: Maintaining effective communication for transparency and alignment.

12. Market Positioning: Directing efforts towards positioning Lokveeraj as an industry leader.

13. Corporate Responsibility: Upholding ethical practices, social impact, and environmental sustainability.

In essence, my role drives Lokveeraj Tech Consulting Services' success through strategic leadership, operational excellence, and commitment to client satisfaction and innovation in the tech industry.

positions.subtitle: Lokveeraj -Tech Consulting Services.
positions.description: Lokveeraj is an accomplished IT/QA Solution Architect specializing in cross-platform mobile app development and IoT solutions. With expertise in creating applications compatible with diverse operating systems, he navigates the entire product development lifecycle.In strategic planning, Lokveeraj develops comprehensive IT and QA architecture roadmaps, ensuring alignment with project goals. As a team leader, he guides technical teams, overseeing architectural aspects and driving product finalization. His technical oversight guarantees adherence to design principles in full-stack development, covering frontend, backend, and database systems.Lokveeraj spearheads API integrations, ensuring seamless connectivity, and embeds QA considerations into architecture and development processes. He implements best practices to guarantee product quality and oversees IT and QA solution delivery, ensuring customer satisfaction.In talent management, Lokveeraj participates in acquisition, identifying key individuals and fostering skill development within the team. He champions continuous improvement initiatives in architecture, development, and QA processes, communicating effectively with stakeholders and providing updates on project progress.Adaptable and forward-thinking, Lokveeraj stays abreast of industry trends, integrating new technologies when relevant. He believes success in architecting, developing, and delivering cutting-edge IT solutions hinges on the synergy and expertise of the right team. His focus on IoT and mobile apps underscores his commitment to innovation and excellence.
positions.title: Solutions Architect | Flutter | Angular | Firebase/Google Cloud Developer
positions.description_html:
Lokveeraj is an accomplished IT/QA Solution Architect specializing in cross-platform mobile app development and IoT solutions. With expertise in creating applications compatible with diverse operating systems, he navigates the entire product development lifecycle.

In strategic planning, Lokveeraj develops comprehensive IT and QA architecture roadmaps, ensuring alignment with project goals. As a team leader, he guides technical teams, overseeing architectural aspects and driving product finalization. His technical oversight guarantees adherence to design principles in full-stack development, covering frontend, backend, and database systems.

Lokveeraj spearheads API integrations, ensuring seamless connectivity, and embeds QA considerations into architecture and development processes. He implements best practices to guarantee product quality and oversees IT and QA solution delivery, ensuring customer satisfaction.

In talent management, Lokveeraj participates in acquisition, identifying key individuals and fostering skill development within the team. He champions continuous improvement initiatives in architecture, development, and QA processes, communicating effectively with stakeholders and providing updates on project progress.

Adaptable and forward-thinking, Lokveeraj stays abreast of industry trends, integrating new technologies when relevant. He believes success in architecting, developing, and delivering cutting-edge IT solutions hinges on the synergy and expertise of the right team. His focus on IoT and mobile apps underscores his commitment to innovation and excellence.

experience.title: Cloud Architecture Consultant
experience.description: As an IT/QA Solution Architect and FullStack Mobile App/Backend Developer, I played a pivotal role in leading the development of "JustPic". Responsibilities included defining the project architecture to align with the vision of providing users a platform to showcase their passions.In terms of technology stack, I showcased expertise in DART, Js, TypeScript, NodeJs, RDBMS, SQL, SQLite, XML, HTML, CSS, Arduino Sketch (IoT), WordPress, Kotlin, Swift, OpenAI, and various payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay). Robust backend solutions were implemented using Node.js, incorporating NoSQL databases and AWS, GCP/Firebase.For mobile app development, I utilized Flutter and Angular frameworks for cross-platform compatibility, ensuring seamless user experiences on both Android and iOS platforms. Cloud and database management involved leveraging GCP, AWS, and Firebase for scalable cloud infrastructure, incorporating SAM/Lambda, Cloud Functions, and Microservices.I orchestrated CI/CD processes, ensuring efficient deployment workflows, and integrated cloud services such as SNS, FCM, and others for enhanced cloud functionality. Collaborative tools like Git for version control and Postman for API testing ensured reliability and functionality. Angular was employed for web app development, while Docker and Kubernetes optimized deployment and scalability.The integration of OpenAI enhanced the application with advanced AI capabilities, focusing on identity communication and networking. Arduino Sketch facilitated IoT functionalities, expanding the app's capabilities and ensuring seamless communication with Arduino-based devices.Various payment gateways, including Stripe, PayPal, and Razorpay, were integrated with robust security measures to safeguard user data and financial transactions. Development environments included Android Studio, VS Code, and Xcode for native app development, with code quality and consistency maintained through rigorous testing using Firebase Test Lab.
experience.description_html:
As an IT/QA Solution Architect and FullStack Mobile App/Backend Developer, I played a pivotal role in leading the development of "JustPic". Responsibilities included defining the project architecture to align with the vision of providing users a platform to showcase their passions.

In terms of technology stack, I showcased expertise in DART, Js, TypeScript, NodeJs, RDBMS, SQL, SQLite, XML, HTML, CSS, Arduino Sketch (IoT), WordPress, Kotlin, Swift, OpenAI, and various payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay). Robust backend solutions were implemented using Node.js, incorporating NoSQL databases and AWS, GCP/Firebase.
For mobile app development, I utilized Flutter and Angular frameworks for cross-platform compatibility, ensuring seamless user experiences on both Android and iOS platforms. Cloud and database management involved leveraging GCP, AWS, and Firebase for scalable cloud infrastructure, incorporating SAM/Lambda, Cloud Functions, and Microservices.

I orchestrated CI/CD processes, ensuring efficient deployment workflows, and integrated cloud services such as SNS, FCM, and others for enhanced cloud functionality. Collaborative tools like Git for version control and Postman for API testing ensured reliability and functionality. Angular was employed for web app development, while Docker and Kubernetes optimized deployment and scalability.

The integration of OpenAI enhanced the application with advanced AI capabilities, focusing on identity communication and networking. Arduino Sketch facilitated IoT functionalities, expanding the app's capabilities and ensuring seamless communication with Arduino-based devices.
Various payment gateways, including Stripe, PayPal, and Razorpay, were integrated with robust security measures to safeguard user data and financial transactions. Development environments included Android Studio, VS Code, and Xcode for native app development, with code quality and consistency maintained through rigorous testing using Firebase Test Lab.

positions.subtitle: L√§nsf√∂rs√§kringar AB. Employed by Infosys
positions.description: Systems Integration Coordinator/SIT Manager:- Coordinated activities between Business and QA teams in Stockholm and India.- Executed Soap UI tests for APIs to ensure seamless integration. - Held responsibility for ST test plan, Test Executions, and deliverables, facilitating the transition to AT.Performance Test Coordinator:- Gained comprehensive knowledge of the Applications Landscape in Life/Non-Life Domains.- Conducted LoadRunner tests for the web, SoapUI tests for APIs, and planned Performance tests for each release.- Scripted for key applications, implemented stubs, and employed virtualization techniques for load and performance tests.- Ensured performance metric deliverables aligned with scope applications for every release.IT Project Manager:- Implemented SAFe¬Æ practices for integration analysis, optimizing project efficiency.- Managed project planning, collaborated with vendors, and ensured service delivery.- Reviewed QA reports, promoted TDD, and collaborated with IT Architects to align projects with architectural strategies.As a cohesive team, we successfully implemented SAFe¬Æ practices, enhancing integration analysis and overall project efficiency. Our meticulous planning and execution of performance tests for key applications significantly contributed to the success of each release, ensuring optimal system performance. positions.title: System Integration Manager
positions.description_html:
Systems Integration Coordinator/SIT Manager:
- Coordinated activities between Business and QA teams in Stockholm and India.
- Executed Soap UI tests for APIs to ensure seamless integration.
- Held responsibility for ST test plan, Test Executions, and deliverables, facilitating the transition to AT.
Performance Test Coordinator:
- Gained comprehensive knowledge of the Applications Landscape in Life/Non-Life Domains.
- Conducted LoadRunner tests for the web, SoapUI tests for APIs, and planned Performance tests for each release.
- Scripted for key applications, implemented stubs, and employed virtualization techniques for load and performance tests.
- Ensured performance metric deliverables aligned with scope applications for every release.
IT Project Manager:
- Implemented SAFe® practices for integration analysis, optimizing project efficiency.
- Managed project planning, collaborated with vendors, and ensured service delivery.
- Reviewed QA reports, promoted TDD, and collaborated with IT Architects to align projects with architectural strategies.

As a cohesive team, we successfully implemented SAFe® practices, enhancing integration analysis and overall project efficiency. Our meticulous planning and execution of performance tests for key applications significantly contributed to the success of each release, ensuring optimal system performance. The coordination efforts in integration activities and the effective management of projects and service delivery showcased the team's commitment to excellence.

Performance Test, Test Automation, LoadRunner (VuGen, Controller), TFS, Soap UI, Visio, Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), Agile / SCRUM, Kanban, CI/CD, Scrum of Scrums

positions.subtitle: Infosys
positions.description: Led quality assurance efforts for 5 years at Swiss Re Reinsurance Client during my tenure at Infosys.Efficient Testing Processes: Streamlined and automated testing methodologies using QTP (UFT), resulting in faster and more reliable testing processes.Organized Test Management: Implemented HP Quality Center (QC) for comprehensive test management, ensuring organized and systematic testing practices.Quality Deliverables: Engaged in various testing methods to uphold high-quality deliverables, contributing to the overall quality assurance standards of Swiss Re.Subject Matter Expertise (SME) Contribution: As an SME for the Common Integration Application (CIA), played a pivotal role in the integration landscape of Property and casualty and Life and health Reinsurance domains.Enhanced Efficiency: The team's efforts led to increased efficiency in the testing lifecycle, resulting in improved project outcomes and client satisfaction.
positions.title: System Test Engineer
positions.description_html:
Led quality assurance efforts for 5 years at Swiss Re Reinsurance Client during my tenure at Infosys.
Efficient Testing Processes: Streamlined and automated testing methodologies using QTP (UFT), resulting in faster and more reliable testing processes.
Organized Test Management: Implemented HP Quality Center (QC) for comprehensive test management, ensuring organized and systematic testing practices.
Quality Deliverables: Engaged in various testing methods to uphold high-quality deliverables, contributing to the overall quality assurance standards of Swiss Re.
Subject Matter Expertise (SME) Contribution: As an SME for the Common Integration Application (CIA), played a pivotal role in the integration landscape of Property and casualty and Life and health Reinsurance domains.
Enhanced Efficiency: The team's efforts led to increased efficiency in the testing lifecycle, resulting in improved project outcomes and client satisfaction.

experience.title: Software Test Engineer
experience.description: Employed by Infosys Ltd.Led quality assurance efforts for 5 years at Swiss Re Reinsurance Client during my tenure at Infosys. Efficient Testing Processes: Streamlined and automated testing methodologies using QTP (UFT), resulting in faster and more reliable testing processes. Organized Test Management: Implemented HP Quality Center (QC) for comprehensive test management, ensuring organized and systematic testing practices. Quality Deliverables: Engaged in various testing methods to uphold high-quality deliverables, contributing to the overall quality assurance standards of Swiss Re. Subject Matter Expertise (SME) Contribution: As an SME for the Common Integration Application (CIA), played a pivotal role in the integration landscape of Property and casualty and Life and health Reinsurance domains. Enhanced Efficiency: The team's efforts led to increased efficiency in the testing lifecycle, resulting in improved project outcomes and client satisfaction. As a cohesive team during our tenure at Swiss Re Reinsurance, we achieved remarkable milestones by implementing efficient testing processes through the adept use of QTP (UFT) for automation and HP Quality Center (QC) for organized test management. Our collective efforts ensured the delivery of high-quality solutions, and my role as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) for the Common Integration Application (CIA) significantly contributed to the integration landscape, reinforcing our commitment to excellence in Property and casualty and Life and health Reinsurance domains.Test Automation, Jira & Confluence, ALM, HP Quality Center (QC), UFT (QTP), VBA (Excel Scripts), V-Model, Waterfall, RAD, TDD
experience.description_html:
Employed by Infosys Ltd.

Led quality assurance efforts for 5 years at Swiss Re Reinsurance Client during my tenure at Infosys.

Efficient Testing Processes: Streamlined and automated testing methodologies using QTP (UFT), resulting in faster and more reliable testing processes.

Organized Test Management: Implemented HP Quality Center (QC) for comprehensive test management, ensuring organized and systematic testing practices.

Quality Deliverables: Engaged in various testing methods to uphold high-quality deliverables, contributing to the overall quality assurance standards of Swiss Re.

Subject Matter Expertise (SME) Contribution: As an SME for the Common Integration Application (CIA), played a pivotal role in the integration landscape of Property and casualty and Life and health Reinsurance domains.

Enhanced Efficiency: The team's efforts led to increased efficiency in the testing lifecycle, resulting in improved project outcomes and client satisfaction.

As a cohesive team during our tenure at Swiss Re Reinsurance, we achieved remarkable milestones by implementing efficient testing processes through the adept use of QTP (UFT) for automation and HP Quality Center (QC) for organized test management. Our collective efforts ensured the delivery of high-quality solutions, and my role as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) for the Common Integration Application (CIA) significantly contributed to the integration landscape, reinforcing our commitment to excellence in Property and casualty and Life and health Reinsurance domains.

Test Automation, Jira & Confluence, ALM, HP Quality Center (QC), UFT (QTP), VBA (Excel Scripts), V-Model, Waterfall, RAD, TDD

matched.match_rationale: Tarven murugarajan has knowledge in Information Security and network security, which could be related to the skills of Puja Abhishek Singh.

detailed_profile.name: Tarven murugarajan
detailed_profile.about: Hi I am Tarven a recent graduate of a diploma program in Information Security from politeknik Ungku Omar. As a highly motivated and passionate individual, I am eager to pursue a career in the field of Information Security and am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your organization. During my studies, I gained extensive knowledge in various areas of Information Security including network security, data protection, risk management, and cybersecurity best practices. I have also developed a strong foundation in programming languages such as Python, Java, and SQL, which will enable me to analyze and identify potential security threats and vulnerabilities. I am a quick learner, an effective problem solver and am comfortable working both independently and as part of a team. I possess excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, and am able to articulate complex technical concepts to a non-technical audience. I am confident that my skills and enthusiasm for the field of Information Security make me a strong candidate for any entry-level position in this field.

education.title: Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia
education.field: Computer and Information Systems Security/Information Assurance
